title: Louise Haigh – 2021 Comments on Ireland’s Statement on Amnesty Proposals
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Louise Haigh, the Shadow Secretary of State for Northern Ireland, on 15 July 2021.
content:
The Government have serious questions to answer over the legality of their amnesty proposals. They must publish the legal advice they have received.
